amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase Military Construction funding for expenses related to Hurricane Katrina.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding by $15,890,000 for the Military Construction, Navy and Marine Corps account, and to increase funding by $40,000,000 for the Military Construction, Air Force account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Taylor (MS) amendment (A027) Agreed to by recorded vote: 250 - 171 (Roll no. 54).
